name: Gai Mover
description:
Gai Mover is a game made by happy Enjmin Students in France during the ENJAM

In the middle of a haters demonstration, you are here to spread happiness and love to people. Make your lovers crowd grow and make your way to the head of the procession!

Controls

  • Arrows key to move
  • Q to hug

TEAM

Developers : Thibault Baron, Rémi Cros

2D Artist : Noémie Szmrzsik-Cohard

Sound Designer : Timothée Sonnier

Game Designers : Paul Barbier, Charlotte Couder

 Producer : Raphaël Isnard
